I think I have just the right biographical movie for you! Have you considered "The Queen" (2014)? This powerful drama stars Helen Mirren as Queen Elizabeth II, and explores her reaction to the death of Princess Diana. It's a fascinating look at the inner workings of the British monarchy, and Mirren's performance is simply phenomenal.

Or, if you're in the mood for something a bit more action-packed, "Without Limits" (1998) might be up your alley! This biographical sports drama tells the story of Steve Prefontaine, a legendary runner who pushed the limits of human endurance. With great performances from Billy Crudup and Jennifer Connelly, this film is sure to get your heart racing.

Let me know if either of these options strike a chord with you!
